Indian Economy.title: Trump has announced G2 – with China. What should India do
Indian Economy.summary: S Jaishankar once said that India’s policy of multi-alignment would require it to 'engage America, manage China, cultivate Europe, reassure Russia'. India is now required to, in fact, 'manage' America and 'engage' China, while continuing to 'reassure' Russia

Indian Economy.title: Karnataka to skill 30 lakh youth by 2032, says CM Siddaramaiah
Indian Economy.summary: Karnataka unveils ₹4,432-crore plan to skill 30 lakh youth by 2032, boost women’s ITI enrolment and set up a Skill University in Sandur

Indian Economy.title: The statecraft of aspiration—Why India loves setting impossible national targets
Indian Economy.summary: India’s apparent fixation with grand targets—with AI gains now joining a long scroll—says as much about its system of governance as the scale of its ambitions. They serve a purpose that policy circles are familiar with but onlookers may be puzzled by.

Indian Economy.title: Building strategic ties with India, terror a threat to both: Israel FM
Indian Economy.summary: This is Sa’ar’s first official visit to India, ahead of a possible visit by Netanyahu in December this year.

Indian Economy.title: This trillionaire economy thrived in a global order Trump is ditching
Indian Economy.summary: The question now is whether Poland — and other European countries that benefited from an era of international collaboration — can sustain momentum in the new order taking shape.

Startups & Funding.title: Zynk raises $5 million to make global payments instant, led by Hivemind Capital
Startups & Funding.summary: Zynk raises $5 million led by Hivemind Capital to scale instant cross-border payments and expand corridor coverage across key global markets.

Startups & Funding.summary: The platform offers free initial access with complimentary credits for registered users to explore startup and investor profiles, followed by a pay-as-you-go micro-payment model

Startups & Funding.summary: Joshi's departure follows CEO Deepak Mehrotra's resignation in August, amid ongoing challenges for Aakash, including legal disputes and employee layoffs.

Startups & Funding.summary: Eternal is aggressively expanding its going-out segment beyond movies and dining, leveraging young users’ demand for engaging fitness to boost transaction values and cement market dominance in out-of-home consumption.

Banking & Finance.summary: Seemant Kumar Singh, Commissioner of Police, Bengaluru, said the accused—arrested from different parts of Bengaluru and  Andhra Pradesh—were sent to judicial custody.

Banking & Finance.title: Bollywood stars can’t enjoy meal if paps don’t click them in restaurants, says Chetan Bhagat: ‘It’s a sick life, many suffer from mental health issues’
Banking & Finance.summary: Chetan Bhagat says Bollywood actors can't enjoy their meal in a restaurant if no one comes to click them. Calling it a 'sick life', he said that many of them suffer from mental health issues.

Technology Sector.summary: Azad Engineering, a key supplier of precision engine parts for giants like Boeing and Rolls-Royce, boasts a massive Rs 6,000 crore order book. But with its stock trading at a 100x+ P/E, can it justify the sky-high valuation?
